website_summaries.verdict: Very small media tower, but it has a nice-looking design and a sturdy base.
pros: Narrow design gives you a lot of options for squeezing it into a small space along a wall
Offered in two color options, oak or black
Sturdier build quality than you might expect from such a tall and narrow design
Assembly is easier than what you'll usually find with this type of furniture
cons: Holds up to 65 DVD cases, so it's very small

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and can not be returned :(
customer_reviews.text: I’d ordered the larger version of this a couple of years ago and it was fine and has held up nicely. I ordered this one and it came with a crack on one of the sides..... when I tried to return it, it said I could not return .... it’s usable but for the price it should arrived perfect..... I order so much on Amazon and have for years.... I will start reading return policy on everything going forward. I can’t see how you can not return something when it’s damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: pba

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit smaller than I expected. A breeze to put together. I like the slim factor. It's a good organizer for your games and blue-rays. Although I prefer real wood, it's nicely designed so it blends well. If your collection is huge you might need 2 or 3 or better yet get something bigger. If you're just starting a Blu-ray collection like I am it should be just fine to get you started.
customer_reviews.author: J. LUGO

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, and BEWARE of using questions/answers - misleading!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a whim, based on the storage capacity I saw in the Q&A section. My fault, I guess, but I didn't realize that the Q&A was for multiple DIFFERENT models, NOT just for the model I was looking at. One of the top answers stated that the until held 320 blurays. The slim tower will barely hold 100, and even less DVDs. Once bitten, twice shy. Last time I order anything like this online. As for the quality. Easy to assemble, but cheap and came with a few nicks in it. Not worth the bother to send it back. I could actually use another one, now, since this did not have the capacity I was anticipating. nah.
customer_reviews.author: S. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble & Well Fit for Purpose, but Slightly Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product was what I expected, except that the black finish of one of the corners of the base was damaged. The cause appears to be poor packaging (i.e. - insufficient padding) of that particular item. Rather than go through the trouble of returning the entire storage stand and risk receiving another one similar damaged because of inadequate padding, I decided to keep it and will eventually touch up the damaged finish (which is quite obvious) so that it is hardly distinguishable.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE & FUNCTIONAL but CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: My expectation were met. Item is cheap in all areas: price and construction. Amazon was very helpful and credited me back a % of the price - i had no way to return. Product was damaged in transit - both of the side panels were cracked and the cardboard packaging mirrors the panels. I assembled very carefully and in the end the item proved functional. So be on notice, you might run into the same issues. I love simple/ minimal - would have given ore stars if not for the damage.
customer_reviews.author: P. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not for long distance shipping
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this, it was delivered with a bend in the box. Not surprisingly, it was broken once I opened it. I ordered and waited for a replacement. It too arrive with a slight bend in the box. Fortunately it was not damaged, but it did have a slight bend with the two side panels. Nothing I could not fix though. Overall, not a bad piece of shelving, but definitely not what I would call quality. I think much of the issue has to do with shipping and its packaging. While it does look nice, and was easy to put together, it is not something I would recommend if you have to have it shipped across country.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  R. Spielman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in my craft space
customer_reviews.text: I have a small craft space and enough crafting supplies to fill a small store. I'm using this to nicely display my inks, sprays, paints, and chalks.. Like this so much, I'm buying another to store all my Stampin' Up stamps. I think I put it together in 45 min (with most of that time was spent deciding on shelf heights and a snack break).
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: You are obviously not buying a high quality item, that being said, I was really surprised by how easy the shelf was to assemble and while it is not the sturdiest shelf in the world, it does its job and looks really nice. Don't be put off by the bad reviews, I am no expert in assembling furniture, but also have had my fair share of experiences, and this was one of the better ones. Yes, there is some hammering of a few nails involved, but if you prepare all your pieces, lay out the instructions and just follow the step by step, it's an easy job, and you will end up with a nice shelf for your CDs.
customer_reviews.author: elli003

customer_reviews.title: False advertising its smaller than the add
customer_reviews.text: The info in this is that it is 13"W x 51"H x 8.75"D however the 13" is the base that holds it up. The space you have for dvd/cs is only 8.5 "W and 6"D so you will not be able to hold much in this thing. I would give it a 1 star but the construction of it is good, it feels sturdy.. Just remember this REAL dimensions of this is 8.5"W x 51"H x 6"D
customer_reviews.author: Fayt

customer_reviews.title: The material is cheeeeeeap !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I opened the box, I could tell this item was not good. The shelves and backing are like paper. While trying to assemble the item, the dowels wouldn’t go in. I then used a drill to enlarge the hole. No luck. This item is not worth it. I purchased two and trashed two!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Been everywhere

customer_reviews.title: Thick quality wood
customer_reviews.text: Great wood thick and sturdy. High quality is used. Only down fall is it made a tiny split when I hammered in the nail for the back board. I reccomend when hammering the back board to go light handed an over as much as you can away from the top board for the nails that are close to the edges of the top and bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: It does what it does!
customer_reviews.text: This goes together easily, 15 minutes - max! Each shelf holds 20 CD's for a total of 160. Unfortunately, mine unit came with two right sides (uprights). I contacted the manufacturer who quickly sent out the left side. All's good now!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY! Poorly manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed. Need guides and starter holes for where nails should be placed. Not hard to assemble, but hard to get level. It would not stand straight.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to boys

customer_reviews.title: Slim Yet Holds A Lot
customer_reviews.text: Slim yet holds a lot of CD/DVD's or what ever you want in a small place. Solid black color blends in with decor of my other electronics. Doesn't tip over. Worth the money and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EvaluatorTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could rank higher
customer_reviews.text: The bottom base board, BT-0300, was missing! Hard to assemble, when the single most critical element to the product is nowhere to be found in said product. I'll have to make a trip to Menards and improvise. The rest is fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Stiefel

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Average
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package, everything looked as expected. I felt that the instructions were confusing and hard to follow. I was able to figure out what had to be done and assembled the product. The pieces weren't of the best quality but it will do. I thought the depth of the shelves was a little skimpy but it is what it is. They work. The piece is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Larger storage than I had before and they match my smaller ones I bought from I don’t remember where.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the style
customer_reviews.text: I like the style. easy enough to put together - but, and this is a big butt! I don't know where I read that it would hold 145 DVDs. Nothing near that 80-85 depending on how you stack or stand them and a few more if you leave the shelves out entirely, just lying the DVDs on their side - which I don't like - other than that, it looks good and it serves it's purpose. First one was broken by UPS - Amazon replaced with no issues at all. I love my Amazon Prime!! The best!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Riner

customer_reviews.title: slim mutimedia storage cabinet
customer_reviews.text: For 3 days I have been trying to put this media cabinet together. What appeared to be simple, turns out to be a headache. The cams are not locking when you try to attached left and right side. I will continue to try to put this cabinet together. Do not recommend to anyone if you don't feel like spending time trying to get cams to lock.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Mayers

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Loses 1/2 a star because it takes some time to set up and instructions could be more clear. If you like the look of it and need storage, then this is a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: This CD case is the perfect size for someone who needs to store their CD ...
customer_reviews.text: This CD case is the perfect size for someone who needs to store their CD in a apartment .It’s sleek and not too hard to put together.However when I got this delivered I had to spend time with a razor blade getting glue off the CD case.It I’d was too big to return just for that reason so I made do. Hello just thought the quality control was poor.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Fine looking storage device perfect for CD'S or cassette tapes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive piece of furniture that looks good in any place of the home. Excellent for storing a moderate amount of CD's or cassette tapes.
customer_reviews.author: David Charles Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great compact CD storage
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our teenage son and after reading reviews I told my husband to prepare himself for a difficult assembly. He is not very handy when it comes to assembly. Perhaps they have improved directions, I don't know but he assembled it in about 30 minutes and said the directions were fine and he's had much worse. This is a great compact, nice looking cd tower that has a high capacity of storage (160 CD's). It was delivered in a slim tall box and had no flaws whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: CindiL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered black, received oak and black. Much smaller than expected. Purchased based on reviews stating it holds 185 DVD’s. Won’t even hold 85 PlayStation 4 cases, which are smaller. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Gotten The Double
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Slim Tower to replace an old multimedia rack. I should have gotten the double or larger. The unit only holds 80 DVDs, depending on packaging. It was easy to assemble and looks fine, but I needed more space.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: They love it and no problem assembling
customer_reviews.text: Gift to son & his family. They love it and no problem assembling. Fits perfectly in small space between wall and entertainment equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine T.

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice, but is not as big as indicated so it holds far less VHS/DVDs than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Shawny

customer_reviews.title: Just right shelves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing my CDs--just the right size, etc. Yes, some of us still have CDs! Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: the DA

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Price is a bit high for what it is, but it does its job. My Blu-rays and XBox games now have a proper home instead of being stacked on a bookshelf. Materials are nice. Assembly is easy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect in the place I had designated and matched my furniture perfectly. Used it for cd's and knicknacks.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Basically about what I expected. You get what you pay for. The unit actually arrived damaged (side panel cracked), but not deep enough to warrant returning the item. Would I recommend it. No.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Holds about 75 regular sized DvD boxes. Not damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa mcneese

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying front this company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black unit. I got a unit with black on the inside and natural wood on the outside. The top is also natural wood, but the bottom is black. I'm going to have to paint them now. I would not recommend buying front this company.
customer_reviews.author: Don Parsons

customer_reviews.title: It is cheaply made and was very dirty, had to clean all pieces before assembly
customer_reviews.text: It is cheaply made and was very dirty, had to clean all pieces before assembly. Full of sawdust and dust. It also had a small crack on the edge and it looks like they may have tried to fill in with paint. For the price, could have been made better!
customer_reviews.author: glen

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable and pieces don't fit together
customer_reviews.text: The holes drilled into the base were too small for any of the wooden dowels or blue screws to fit. I got the company to resend the messed up pieces and they were even worse. So I paid $50 for something that can't be put together or returned. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: CHR

customer_reviews.title: Broken boards.
customer_reviews.text: This product came in with both of the side panels cracked and slightly bent. I would have possibly forgiven it... if those panels were not the same board. I had two left panels, both broken. I was so upset.
customer_reviews.author: Breánna

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with cracks in the wood
customer_reviews.text: Both of the side pieces came with cracks in the wood due to shipping. It still assembled okay but the packaging could be better with more foam to avoid bending / cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Easy to put together. I built it a week before I had my baby so know anybody can pretty much manage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Really love the product
customer_reviews.text: This fits in little spaces perfectly. Really love the product. However, the instructions are pretty much useless so be ready for that
customer_reviews.author: CynicallySweet7

customer_reviews.title: Great CD and DVD cabinet for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and all the parts were included. The holes were drilled in the correct positions. Fits well in a compact space.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted! :)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast and easy to put together. Just what I wanted! :)
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer in PNW

customer_reviews.title: Beautful Stand
customer_reviews.text: very good quality structure, the only problem I have with the stand is it does not as much space for DVD as it said so, if you need more room order the double media stand.
customer_reviews.author: sweetshabear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dimensions for DVD's or
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Perfect dimensions for DVD's or, in my case, PS3/4 games.
customer_reviews.author: Mygurlywayz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to put together. Go slow and it takes less than 30 minutes. Perfect size, looks great. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Gail Photo

customer_reviews.title: Great organization
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great amount of storage for cd's or dvd's. I have two set up side by side and they take up very little space. If you have small children (or cats) you'll want to secure to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: jinfl

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect size. It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new CD storage unit. This was the perfect size. It was easy to assemble. Only took about 30minutes. It's sturdy and fits in the small space I have next to my stereo system. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nick martin

customer_reviews.title: I would have been better off buying a second bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Wildly overpriced, and only holds 70 DVDs in standard cases. Assembled OK; instructions clear. However, for example, I just bought a 28" x 72" bookcase for almost exactly the same money. I would have been better off buying a second bookcase! If you have only 70 DVDs or less this would be fine (but still horribly overpriced). If you have more than 70 you'll need to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Systems

customer_reviews.title: You will never find one like this anywhere - I had a narrow space and ...
customer_reviews.text: You will never find one like this anywhere - I had a narrow space and it fits perfectly and is good looking and holds many DVD's and CD's. Try it - you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Florrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive tower and perfect for my sons game storage. Do not put heavy things up on the higher shelves so it doesn’t tip over. Has a pretty small base. No problems or issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shelving unit.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking stand. Holding blu ray and 4k discs with the cases just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: The Look!
customer_reviews.text: The look of this tower matches one I bought a long while ago. It is great to find something with that same look.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Easily accommodates more than 100 CDs. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Black Slim Media Storage Tower
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered so it could be a match to the one that we already have. It lacks 9 3/16" of being as tall as the one we already had, but we knew this when it was ordered. Will find something to make it to the same height. These will go on each side of our tv and put a bridge across to complete a unit look.
customer_reviews.author: Saphire

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It came cracked. we took it out of the box and it was already broken...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. A bit pricey, but it was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Love this DVD tower
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for the space we had and relatively easy to put together. It looks very nice in my family room and holds a lot of DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black slim Media Storage Tower
customer_reviews.text: Great little shelves for you DvD's or Music cd's.Looks great next to my TV
customer_reviews.author: Kuuipo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The box was damage and one of the parts looks it was ready to be snap in half.
customer_reviews.author: avery

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something Else
customer_reviews.text: Very wobbly and the bits don't fit to put in holes for shelf piece. I think the shelf holes were too small. I bought this for color. I also got this because it was tiny enough to fit in the small space in between the dresser and cabinet due to me being in a small bedroom. There is also not enough shelf space. This will fall over if you so much as tap it so it's best placed against a wall Do not buy this if you can afford to.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great addition.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my excess CDs that fit in a small space and this storage tower was perfect. Loods great and inexpensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Paukenpoi

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Advertisement lists the dimensions as 13"W x 51"H x 8.75"D which only pertains to the base support. Each cubby internally is only 8-3/8 wide and 5-3/4 in depth. It provides you with 7 shelves, but if you are using it for DVDs and Blu-Ray you can only use 6 out of 9 possible cubbies. The wood is cheap particle board and for $50 it is much too cheap for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Daemon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: After attempting to assemble this thing and realizing that most of the pre-drilled holes didn't line up, I boxed it up and sent it back. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Danny E. Pinter

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Blu Ray shelf for my room that didn't take up a lot of floor space and this is perfect for that. It will fill up quick if you buy Blue Rays often but if you want more a smaller one because you don't have many or just want a few for a room it is a good choice. Shipped dusty but no scratches, scraps or dents like you see when ordering furniture and such online. Also this is a black shelf, not sort of black, it is black.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Mawhinney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very attractive. Does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schamel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged the shelf was broke in half not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: holes on top piece drilled in backwards!
customer_reviews.text: I received this and the top piece had the holes drilled in backwards, so I could not assemble.
customer_reviews.author: lil duke

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: It does what its supposed to do, looks good and is quite sturdy. Doesnt hold many DVDs though. Filled and need more space, do consider bigger ones. Easy to put together, whoever said its instructions suck, you shouldn't be alowed to hold a screwdriver SUPER EASY!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This time the condition wasn't so great
customer_reviews.text: It had some slight damage on the very top front. Which I have to repair or replace the whole thing if I can't repair it.It easy to put together like usual,just like the first time(I have two of these now) I had no problem assembling it. Great product with good construction just mind this time came with some scud marks. Last time came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: LT playga

customer_reviews.title: good CD tower
customer_reviews.text: The tower assembles easily and provides the space as advertized. While it's not a stellar piece of furniture, it is a good tower for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wittlich

customer_reviews.title: Poor directions
customer_reviews.text: Poor directions. Nice once we glued top on. Give correct directions with items. It looks nice, good color with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: all parts were there and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, all parts were there and easy to assemble. Had a couple of spots needing some touch up paint but still OK for my needs. Only wish I had ordered a stand about twice the width as I still have a bunch of DVDs to store.
customer_reviews.author: JTown

customer_reviews.title: nice simple design that does what we need it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with some marks on the vertical pieces but they are covered by the CD's so this was not a big deal. Overall , nice simple design that does what we need it to do. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Volpone

customer_reviews.title: This item was easy to build and has provided the space we needed
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to build and has provided the space we needed. Works great for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Groat

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Arrived well packed, undamaged and easy to assemble.I wish I would have bought one wider as I didn't realize how many discs I had.Be sure to check first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and even look for more DVD'S in the future best media storage ever
customer_reviews.text: got this for my son with all his DVD'S he can now have a place for all of them and even look for more DVD'S in the future best media storage ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Warner

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: I JUST RECEIVED THE PREPAC SLIM MEDIA STORAGE. ON YOUR PAGE IT SHOWS THE DIMENSIOS AS 13 INCHES WIDE WHEN IN FACT THE SHELVES ARE ONLY 8 INCHES WIDE. LOOKING AT THE PICTURE IT DOES SEEM THAT THE SHELVES ARE WIDE ENOUGH BUT LO & BEHOLD WHEN I OPENED THE PACKAGE I WAS DUNBFOUNDED TO SEE THE SMALL SHELVES. THIS IS VERY DECEPTIVE INFO ABOUT THIS PRODUCT & I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS PURCHASE. THE STAND AT THE BOTTOM IS 13 INCHES WIDE BUT THE WAY THE DIMENSIONS ARE LISTED IS VERY VERY DECEIVING.
customer_reviews.author: LENNYE

product_meta.title: Prepac Slim Multimedia Tower Storage Cabinet, Black
product_meta.description: This neat and compact multimedia storage tower is ideal for small collections or limited spaces. Fully adjustable shelves can be set to any position to accommodate your collection and ensure full flexibility for future changes. Tops and bases are made of profiled MDF and bases are enlarged for extra stability.
feature_bullets: Constructed from high quality laminated composite woods
Capacity: 160 CDs, 65 DVDs, 120 Blu-Ray discs, 40 VHS cassettes or any combination thereof

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars217 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
